subject: Pro X Ultra pedals issue
description_text:
Hello Simsonn team,

I recently purchased a set of Pro X Ultra pedals and I am very happy with
item construction and appearance

However with F1 24 the pedals are being mapped to the same axis than the
steering wheel (Fanatec DD) so I’m not able to use the pedals with that
game.

Couldn’t find any proper solution online so I was wondering if you could
provide any solution or workaround for this, in example change the mapping
setting for the pedals

Looking forward to hearing from you and expecting to find a solution to be
able to enjoy the pedals with my favaorite game

Thanks in advance
Roberto

Sent from Gmail Mobile

conversations.body_text: Hi Roberto Cotelo,  First, update the software to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 in the “Settings → Update” section. Then, in the Settings → Update interface, click Manual Firmware Update, navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis. After completing the update, please test again.

Thanks, it worked.


On Fri, Aug 1, 2025 at 6:47 AM service@simsonn.com
Customer support was very helpful and resolved my issue
